effect_entries.effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first across all Pokéathlon events.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first across all Pokéathlon events.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケスロンの　記録が　はいっている。
競技で　１位　になった
回数が　記録された　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a
card that shows how many times
you have won a Pokéathlon event.

Contiene i tuoi dati Pokéathlon.
Su questa Scheda è registrato il numero di
vittorie nelle gare.

Banda que potencia los movimientos que estrujan
al rival.

Speichert deine Pokéathlon-Rekorde. Die Karte
zeigt, wie oft du in einer Disziplin den 1. Platz
belegt hast.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit votre nombre de
victoires aux épreuves.

포켓슬론의 기록이 들어 있다.
경기에서 1위 한
횟수가 기록된 카드.

ポケスロンの　きろくが　はいっている。
きょうぎで　１い　になった
かいすうが　きろくされた　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times
you’ve won an event.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times
you’ve won an event.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit votre
nombre de victoires aux épreuves.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times
you’ve won an event.
